name: Typhlosion
flavorText:
If its rage peaks,
it becomes so hot
that anything that touches it will
instantly go
up in flames.

pokemon.name: Cyndaquil
pokemon.flavorText:
It has a timid nature. If it is startled, the flames on
its back burn more vigorously.

pokemon.name: Quilava
pokemon.flavorText:
Be careful if it
turns its back
during battle. It means that it will
attack with the
fire on its back.
